Excellent product for everyday use. If you love music just go for Bose. better than any other product in this price range. I have been using this more than one year. no problem yet. and you will get best sound quality and other features like Google assistant/ siri, waterproof protection, 6+ hrs of battery backup etcetera. Also it's a nice travel companion.
If you want a branded Bluetooth Speaker and that too from a brand like Bose, then without any second thought just buy this Bose SoundLink Micro. It is "THE BEST".

Don't go by its size, it may look pretty small on size when compared with the price,  but when you get to hear it's sound, man, no one can stand even near to it. You'll be blown away. It's mids, highs & lows are just awesome. It's worth every penny. Use it with Bose Connect mobile app (available on both Google Play Store & Apple A...

Dont underestimate looking into the size of speaker, small is not only beautiful but also powerful, after listening to bose, i came to know how a song should sound originally balancing vocals, instruments and perfect required bass. May it be a cheapest bose but it has justified more than its price. I have sony music system,i used to love it but after listening this bose i can't stop playing it. Believe me you wont get irritated even after playing for hours. Also, this is perfect for those who...
Considering its size it packs quite a punch, crisp and clear highs, rich and full vocals. Great product. Only one aspect is the price point which is a tad on the higher side.

Bose has created magic with this little speaker. Amazing sound, good design and robust build quality. An excellent companion along the way, one can carry it with ease the sound quality is superb. Being IPX7 rated, its splash proof and water proof in case of any accidents. JBL flip4 doesn't stand a chance with this one, apart from the fact that in case one drowns both in water the Bose sinks, while the JBL flip4 floats. But dont even think about any other alternative if you are concerned on so...

Really nice speakers. Quality is really good volume level is good. Even at very low volume, no loss of quality. Volume though low compared to speakers available for the same price, however compared to it size, it is very surprisingly loud, quite a premium thing. Volume good for most music genres at decent volume. For light music/song at a low noise ambience, even a party can be pulled off with this.

I tend to listen to a lot of instrumental music and therefore it is important to have a balanced sound from the speaker to get an optimum experience. While deciding on a portable Bluetooth speaker I was a bit apprehensive because most of them have huge bass and good battery life but little else. I already have a Bose surround at home and decided to try the Bose Soundlink Micro. Suffice to say I was not disappointed. As usual the sound experience is optimal and clarity of sound is close to the...

I got this product @6300 after discount.

Pros
1. Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity from mobile and laptop is perfect

Cons

2. Hdmi cable connection not working ( may be product fault, try to rectify it from company)
3. Tall speakers are Wired
4. Sub woofer is also Wired

reviews: Overall this speaker is nice.

Bass and normal mode gives U something new as compared to other brands
Looks are pretty nice and they are water resistant so that's a big pro point for me.
Only few things that keep me in doubt for my decision to buy this are

1. The max volume also doesn't grant the expected amount and quality of sound as U would want from a 15W speaker, it is good for small to medium sized rooms, but go for comparison if U have an option between boat an...
Worth for money.. nice bass and clear sound till 90% volume.. sound is not clear in 100%volume.. regarding battery backup, my answer would be wowwwww.. excellent product

The sound is not upto the mark of JBL brand. Under the bass option sound does gets a little better, but not great. Does have IP rating, but in real world I don't think anyone prefers listening to music underwater. So rather than IP ratig they should have concentrated on sound and clariy. Only good thing about the product is it's build quality which is premium. Overall a OK product from JBL.

The bass mode is just a gimmick according to me. For a 15 watt speaker that much bass should be Normal and that non bass mode is just of no use (in low bass mode it sounds pathetic). Upto 70% volume this sounds amazing not that at full volume it distorts, but the sound is better at 70% volume. The sound quality is amazing considering the price, decently loud for a 15 watt speaker. Lastly this is a great alternative to a sony or JBL for great sound quality in good price.

I am writing this review after using this soundbar for more than two weeks. I am describing my review in below points:
1. Decent bass. Good for a medium room. Bluetooth mode sound output is comparatively lesser than usb/aux. FM is quite clear. Overall sound clarity is good.
2. For best bass experince, just place the subwoofer upon any hard and flat surface. This is because, subwoofer air wave output is at bottom.
3. There are five equalizer mode. I had expected a lil more variant in that.

Strong and best build quality, true water resistant, I am getting battery backup @ 50% volume is upto 10 hours. excellent product, nice sound quality, preset sound modes, nice bass in this price segment, good installation service, good connectivity, no lag with tv connection.
Using it since last 6 days :
PROS :
1)  Stylish look
2)  Awesome sound
3) Setting provided in the remote matters
4) 60watt is good enough for the medium sized room (15ft x 12ft)
5) Auto switch off if not in use is helpful
6) Dont expect good result on day one, it takes 2-3 days to gear up to its full power
CONS :
1)  Bluetooth connectivity is poor , gets disconnected now and then , better to get it connected by "AUX" cable . ( i connected it with a 1.5 meter Boat aux cable)
2) If u are conn...
The product is good but there are certain words that play with one’s understanding about functions of this product.
The best feature of this product is that it is an Indian brand.

1) USB connectivity here is a different thing altogether. It doesn’t allow you to connect your tv or other device through USB. By USB, it refers to a flash drive/pendrive that you can plug into to the USB slot and play songs directly from it.
2) If you are connecting it using AUX cable, don’t expect the results ...

Excellent product, nice sound quality. sound is really good. bass is good enough. Attractive look and build quality is also very good. Only problem is with the USB port which is at the back so it can not be hanged on the wall when the USB is connected. happy with purchase. Delivery was before time good service.

I specifically looked for a soundbar (and handpicked this one from boAt due to output power)  without battery to use for child school online sessions. This sound bar is amazing. It has the best bass to treble ratio you need to enjoy any stuff. I personally didnt want a bar with woofer as watching tv with so much boom boom can cause headache. This bar gives you the taste of both in the most balanced way. Must buy.

But it's a satisfactory product, i have my trust on Flipkart and even more on the boAt services.
